TRCommon.税率中设置范围[0,1]，超出范围不让填写。（可以为0）: The tax rate field can only enter Numbers greater than or equal to 0, less than 1
TRCommon.当非项目时，明细不可填写项目名称！: When you choose non project type, project name must be null!
TRCommon.当为项目时，明细请填写项目名称！: When you choose project type, please input project name!
TRCommon.部门领导审核后流程：Line A--预算内并且金额小于5000并且类型为非项目。: Process after department leader approved：Line A-- In Budget and total expense<5000 and type is non project.
TRCommon.Line B-- 预算外或者金额大于等于5000。: Line B-- Off-budget or total expense>=5000.
TRCommon.Line C-- 预算内并且金额小于5000并且类型为项目。: Line C-- Off-budget and total expense<5000 and type is project.
TRCommon.中心副总裁审核后流程：line A-- 预算内并且((国内出差并且金额小于1万): Process after division VP approved：Line A-- In budget and ((national business and total expense<10000) or (International business and total expense<30000))and type is non project.
TRCommon.Line B-- 类型为非项目。: Line B-- Type is non project.
TRCommon.Line C--(预算外或者(国内出差并且金额大于等于1万)或者(国际出差并且金: Line C-- (Off-budget or((national busiess and total expense>=10000) or (International business and total expense>=30000)) and type is non project.
TRCommon.项目总监审核后流程：line A--预算内并且((国内出差并且金额小于1万)或者: Process after project director approved：Line A-- In budget and ((national business and total expense<10000) or (International business and total expense<30000)).
TRCommon.Line B--预算外或者(国内出差并且金额大于等于1万)或者(国际出差并且金额: Line B-- Off-budget or((national busiess and total expense>=10000) or (International business and total expense>=30000)).
